title: Leave Buster is dumb
body: Hi all, so recently i got a leave buster because i could not connect to the game, but that is not why i am annoyed it's because after waiting the 20 min i get a call from a friend while I'm a 1min into the search saying invite, because he is a friend i chuck him an invite and when i go to click the "queue up" button for the 1400 thousand time IT STARTS THE FUCKING 20 MIN LEAVERBUSTER AGAIN MAKING ME WAIT 40MIN BECAUSE I WANTED TO PLAY WITH SOMEONE. The main reason I'm upset about this is because it's different to the low priority queue you get when you dodge champ select, which in my opinion is fucking r%%%%%ed i waited the 20 min now let me play the game i have spent my life and money on >:(. If someone at riot sees this i would like to say.... Please change this make leaverbuster have the same mechanics as low priority. ty & fuck u jk ily ^_^

replies.body:
Because *Leaverbuster* low-priority queues depend on a **completed game** being played through to remove that 20-minute mark, if you drop out once you've started the queue for any reason, it will not count towards removing the LPQ.

While I can't change how the system works, you can leave this feedback on the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) if you'd like. Let me know if you have any questions.
You say "completed game" but remakes count too.
Remakes actually *do not* count towards working down a *low priority queue* for leaving or going AFK during games.
Might want to look into that, then. It's definitely counted in my experience.
